channel.title: Comments on: Why Think by Numbers?

item.title: By: muslim ladies
item.dc:creator: muslim ladies
item.description:
Usually I don't learn article on blogs, however I wish to say that this write-up very forced me to take a look at and do so!
Your writing taste has been amazed me. Thanks, very great post.
item.content:encoded:
Usually I don’t learn article on blogs, however
I wish to say that this write-up very forced me to take a look at and do so!

Your writing taste has been amazed me. Thanks, very great post.

item.title: By: Mike P. Sinn
item.dc:creator: Mike P. Sinn
item.description:
Hi, Michael!
Yes. I loved Cognitive Surplus.
I love your painting, too! I'd love to buy you a real dinner. Where do you live? I'd also be happy to give 100% of my net income from the website as well. (I think that comes out to around negative $200.)
Did you notices that I already had it linked to this site http://fineartamerica.com/featured/triune-brain-michael-stancato.html which says it only costs $2500.
I'll change it to your other site, though. Let me know if you'd ever like me to switch it to anything else or if you don't want me to use it anymore.
It's really brilliant. I appreciate your generosity in not taking me to Judge Judy! :D
item.content:encoded:
Hi, Michael!

Yes. I loved Cognitive Surplus.

I love your painting, too! I’d love to buy you a real dinner. Where do you live? I’d also be happy to give 100% of my net income from the website as well. (I think that comes out to around negative $200.)

Did you notices that I already had it linked to this site http://fineartamerica.com/featured/triune-brain-michael-stancato.html which says it only costs $2500.

I’ll change it to your other site, though. Let me know if you’d ever like me to switch it to anything else or if you don’t want me to use it anymore.

It’s really brilliant. I appreciate your generosity in not taking me to Judge Judy! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Michael71
item.dc:creator: Michael71
item.description:
Hi Mike,
I like what you're promoting and will visit your site to learn more. Have you seen Clay Shirky's idea which is similar to yours?
http://www.ted.com/talks/clay_shirky_how_the_internet_will_one_day_transform_government?language=en
Maybe you can join forces.
I'm the artist for the Triune Brain painting. Wanna buy me a nice dinner... virtually... for the use of the painting? If not feel free to continue using it. I'll chalk it up learning about marking my art for copyrighting etc.... At $75/hour it's probably a $3000 painting.
Can you add a link to my site www.motionista.com or the link to the painting on my blog: http://motionista.blogspot.com/2011/08/august-painting-and-drawing.html
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Mike,

I like what you’re promoting and will visit your site to learn more. Have you seen Clay Shirky’s idea which is similar to yours?

http://www.ted.com/talks/clay_shirky_how_the_internet_will_one_day_transform_government?language=en

Maybe you can join forces.

I’m the artist for the Triune Brain painting. Wanna buy me a nice dinner… virtually… for the use of the painting? If not feel free to continue using it. I’ll chalk it up learning about marking my art for copyrighting etc…. At $75/hour it’s probably a $3000 painting.

Can you add a link to my site http://www.motionista.com/ or the link to the painting on my blog:
http://motionista.blogspot.com/2011/08/august-painting-and-drawing.html

Thanks!

item.title: By: surrounds Search Engine
item.dc:creator: surrounds Search Engine
item.description:
When I originally commented I clicked the "Notify me when new comments are added" checkbox and now each time a comment is added I get several e-mails with the same comment. Is there any way you can remove me from that service? Appreciate it!
Take a look at my website - <a href="http://www.ask.com"/ rel="nofollow">surrounds Search Engine</a>
item.content:encoded:
When I originally commented I clicked the “Notify me when new comments are added” checkbox and now each time a comment
is added I get several e-mails with the same comment.
Is there any way you can remove me from that service?
Appreciate it!

Take a look at my website – surrounds Search Engine

item.title: By: Bob Butterfield
item.dc:creator: Bob Butterfield
item.description: Thank you! I'm always telling everyone how funny, articulate, and informative i am but no one ever believes me! I think the fact that I've received the Canadian seal of approval will change their tune! :D
item.content:encoded: Thank you! I’m always telling everyone how funny, articulate, and informative i am but no one ever believes me! I think the fact that I’ve received the Canadian seal of approval will change their tune! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: CanuckFreeThinker
item.dc:creator: CanuckFreeThinker
item.description: Dear Mighty Bob, I just listened to this podcast, which I found via the Stitcher radio app. I hope Stitcher broadens your listener base, because your message is so needed plus you are damn funny, articulate and informative. Bravo. I look forward to more enjoyment and rational persuasion as I keep listening. - An impressed listener in Ontario, Canada.
item.content:encoded:
Dear Mighty Bob,
I just listened to this podcast, which I found via the Stitcher radio app. I hope Stitcher broadens your listener base, because your message is so needed plus you are damn funny, articulate and informative. Bravo. I look forward to more enjoyment and rational persuasion as I keep listening.
– An impressed listener in Ontario, Canada.
